name: Dinghy
description: Includes oars, and carries up to 4 people or 600 pounds of weight.

name: Hiking Boots
description: Comfortable, so as to accomodate long journeys.

name: Climbing Boots
description: Includes crampons for the surest of footing.

name: Saddle & Bridle
description: Allows riding a horse.

name: Bedroll, Blanket, & Pillow
description: An adventurer need not forsake all comfort.

name: Religious Vestments
description: Distinguishing attire of a priest, or cleric, or similar ilk.

name: Formal Wear
description: Appropriate for appearances before a noble or royal court.

name: Plain Clothes
description: Ordinary clothes for ordinary folk.

name: Signet Ring & Sealing Wax
description: Allows a distinctive wax seal to be affixed to scrolls and letters. Provides proof of authenticity and prevents tampering.

name: Parchment
description: A single blank page of parchment

name: Ink & Quill
description: Sold by the ounce. Ought to last 1000 pages, at least.

name: Scroll
description: 5 feet of blank parchment.

name: Chalk
description: For writing upon stone or rough surfaces.

name: Crystal Ball
description: Aids in scrying, divination, and certain forms of astrology. Highly prized by mages.

name: Magical Staff
description: Infused with deep, yet subtle magic. Favored by wizards and prophets.

name: Bell
description: For calling others to attention, or summoning spirits, depending on one's needs.

name: Censer
description: For the ceremonial burning of incense. Infused with magic of a theurgical sort.

name: Incense
description: 1 pound of sweet smelling incense. An indispensable component of theurgical rituals.

name: Barding
description: Defense armor for a horse. Increases BC while riding by 5.

name: Hunting Trap
description: Reusable. For trapping small animals, such as rabbits, mice, or gophers.

name: Caltrops, 10x
description: Apt to stop charging cavalry, or wound the feet of careless attackers.

name: Chain
description: 10 yards. Heavy, but holds up to 10,000 pounds of weight.

name: Traveler's Chess Set
description: The game of kings. Conveniently designed to allow the board to be folded and stowed along with the pieces.

name: Gambler's Dice
description: A full set. Includes a d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20, for games of chance.

name: A deck of cards.
description: A pristine deck of cards, free of grime and distinguishing marks.

name: Utensils
description: Steel silverware, for fine eating even in rugged places.

name: String
description: 50 feet of string wrapped around a spindle. It's use depends on one's needs and creativity. Good for entertaining cats, if nothing else.
